guide.introduction:
If you enjoy displaying pictures around your house in very creative ways then this is a project you would find interesting. The photo panels use fiber optics to create a starry sky effect surrounding clear pockets that hold your pictures. The fiber optics are really fun especially if you have a basic knowledge of micro-controllers allowing you to make a twinkling effect.

The methods that I will use in this article are one of many ways to create this effect. This would be a great place to start if you have never worked with fiber optics before.

Just a quick warning: This project depending how large you make the panels and how dense you make the fiber optics could take you a long time to complete.
